Description: Small palette of rectangular shape, uniform thickness. No evidence of use. Repaired from four fragments.
Curator's comments: The palette was found broken in the intact tomb of an elderly woman.
Bibliographic references: Brunton & Caton-Thompson 1928 / The Badarian Civilisation and Predynastic Remains near Badari (p. 16; pl. xxi.2) (drawing not accurate)
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
